hero.badge: Helping reunite people with what matters most
hero.title: Find What You've Lost
hero.subtitle: L9ani uses advanced technology and community support to help find missing persons and lost items. Whether it's a loved one, important documents, a phone, keys, or even a pet — upload a photo or report a sighting to help bring them back.

howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Three Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Our platform makes it easy to report and find missing persons or lost items through a simple and secure process.

step1.title: Submit a Report
step1.description: Upload photos and provide details about a missing person, lost item, or something you've found. The more information, the better the chances of recovery.

step2.title: AI-Powered Matching
step2.description: Our advanced algorithms analyze photos and descriptions, comparing them against our database to find potential matches instantly.

step3.title: Get Connected
step3.description: When a match is found, we securely connect the parties involved to help facilitate the reunion — whether it's a family member or a lost belonging.

features.label: Why Choose L9ani
features.title: Powerful Features to Help You
features.subtitle: We've built a comprehensive platform with the tools and technology needed to maximize the chances of finding missing persons and recovering lost items.

feature1.title: Secure & Private
feature1.description: Your data is encrypted and protected. We never share personal information without consent.

feature2.title: Fast Processing
feature2.description: Reports are processed immediately and our AI begins matching within seconds of upload.

feature3.title: Community Network
feature3.description: Thousands of users across Morocco helping to spot and report sightings every day.

feature4.title: 24/7 Support
feature4.description: Our dedicated team is available around the clock to assist with urgent cases.

impact.label: Our Impact
impact.title: Stories That Matter
impact.subtitle: Real stories from people who have been reunited with what they lost through our platform.

testimonial1.quote: Thanks to L9ani, we found our uncle after 3 years of searching. This platform gave us hope when we had none.
testimonial1.name: Ahmed M.

testimonial2.quote: I lost my wallet with all my documents at the market. Someone found it and posted on L9ani. Got it back the same day!
testimonial2.name: Fatima Z.

testimonial3.quote: Our cat went missing for 2 weeks. A neighbor spotted her and reported it on L9ani. She's home now, safe and sound.
testimonial3.name: Omar B.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Every report brings us closer to reuniting someone with what they've lost. Join thousands of Moroccans helping each other recover missing persons and lost belongings.
